page.title: 01CHURCH STRETTON AREA
page.content: {Church Stretton, Hope Bowdler, {Little Stretton, Chelmick, Soudley and {Ragdon are in our Domesday block.}The area is very hilly, almost mountainous in fact. With the many hills and scattered communities it is not surprising the area is so popular with tourists. The windswept moorland and relatively little arable farmland seems a strange mixture to attract tourists. The area appeals to the elderly and many retire here. The main reason for the lack of young people is the lack of work. It also costs a lot to live here, the houses are very expensive. The area is served by the small market town of Church Stretton. The town boasts a reasonable shopping centre. Here you can buy almost every thing you might need.
